Maintaining 1 HP and get 'Unyielding' status when HP is below 0. (1 turns) (This effect can only be used once) 'Unyielding' status cannot be remove. Under 'Unyielding' status, ignore death and will not be affected by any negative status. Increase all attack damage by 10% and ignore 10% targets dodge. But User cannot use any skill and HP cannot be recover.
